channel.title: Environment-Management on Nemo's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Environment-Management on Nemo's Blog

item.title: Life Hacks Series: 1. How to manage your Python Environment
item.description: This is the first article in the Life Hacks Series. It covers how to manage your Python environment. Basically, it covers how to install packages, how to create a new environment, how to clone an environment, and how to pack an environment. A special mention is Conda-Pack, which really made my life a lot easier.
